data.title: The unofficial home of TOTP
meta_keywords: Top of the Pops: The Story of
data.meta_description: The unofficial home of Top of the Pops, the long running BBC Music UK chart show that ran from 1964 to 2006. From artist & presenter appearances, to logos and theme tunes - it's all listed on our extensive encyclopaedia of all things TOTP.
data.text:
'Top of the Pops' is a registered brand owned by the BBC. This website is an information source for the original music show which ran from 1964-2006. This website is not owned or administered by the BBC.

This is an unofficial site for 'Top of the Pops'. All information presented on this page has been researched using multiple sources across the internet, and the information collated and presented to the best of our knowledge is correct, however, please be aware there may be some mistakes, and if there are any we do not wish to cause inconvenience or distress to site visitors. If you spot any factual errors, we are open to feedback and we would be delighted to hear from anyone wishing to offer corrections. All information and opinions expressed on this site are not intended to cause offence, and are not the view of the BBC or the owner of the 'Top of the Pops' brand.

All captured images, still or moving, reproduced on this site are Â© BBC 1964-2024 and are used for educational illustrative purposes. All rights reserved. This site is not officially sanctioned by or affiliated to the BBC, or the 'Top of the Pops' brand in any way.
